title: Stow Ideas
description: A list of investigative story ideas for journalists, including topics such as police overtime, government salaries, school superintendent salaries, university president salaries, airport salaries, stolen luggage at airports, federal stimulus spending, FEMA fire money, farm bill dollars, taser use, unclaimed money funds, lawmaker owned businesses, grocery store prices, car mechanic tests, city claims, damaged city property, arthritis kits, tow trucks, government funded lobbying, and elected official campaign expenses.
